Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE events
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER occurrences in the event log
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that are followed by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that are followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER events that eventually lead to Payment Handled
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER cases that undergo rework (i.e., followed by any Declaration REJECTED by ... and then resubmitted)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Ratio of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in variants that include a pre-approver step
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER events associated with case amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of all rejection-related outcomes (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER) that originate from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER in variants that do not include Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' does not happen

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that are directly succeeded by Request Payment (indicating bypass of expected approval steps)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Average number of times Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER appears per case across all process instances
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that are part of cycles involving repeated rejections and resubmissions
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Ratio of successful approvals (Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER) to total submissions routed to pre-approver (Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that ultimately result in a completed payment (Payment Handled), compared to those ending in rejection or abandonment
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that occur in 2018 versus 2017, considering the expansion of data collection to the entire university
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER events performed per month to detect temporal patterns linked to rejection rates
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities
